comment.author: 33913611@N07
comment._content: I couldn't get into a better position because of street vendors, traffic, the crowds, and pouring rain, but I so liked the similar sensibility between the two crowds in the same place that I put these two together. And it's always interesting when utilities are still in the same spot after all these years, such as the corner lamppost. I'll have to go back in December to see what happens:
